content: - Trafalgar Law saves Luffy in the Marineford Arc. During the timeskip, he's not just involved in the Rocky Port Incident but also joins the Warlords. In the Punk Hazard Arc, he not just forms an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates which holds until the Wano Country Arc but it's also revealed he ate the Ope Ope no Mi a Devil Fruit of great power and value. In the Dressrosa Arc, he's revealed to be a member of the D. and is involved in the battle against Donquixote Doflamingo. In the Wano Country Arc, he participates in the Raid on Onigashima where he not just fights the Emperors Kaidou and Big Mom and is involved in the latter's defeat but also reveals that he wants to find out the secret behind the Will of D..
